DOC.brief_summary: This study is to evaluate the safety and the effectiveness of treatment with tacrolimus and biological agents.
DOC.brief_title: Special Drug Use-Results Survey of Prograf Capsule in Rheumatoid Arthritis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of this study is to confirm the safety of 24 weeks-treatment with the combination of tacrolimus + biological agents, and to assess the efficacy using SDAI, CDAI, DAS28-CRP, MMP-3, MHAQ in patients with rheumatoid arthritis who have not achieved SDAI remission despite of using biological agents for over 8 weeks.
DOC.criteria: patients with rheumatoid arthritis who have been treated with biological agents over 8 weeks but have not achieved SDAI remission (SDAI < 3.3)
